pkgmetadata.longdescription: Time Series Disaggregation // Disaggregates low frequency time series data to higher frequency series. Implements the following methods for temporal disaggregation: Boot, Feibes and Lisman (1967) DOI:10.2307/2985238, Chow and Lin (1971) DOI:10.2307/1928739, Fernandez (1981) DOI:10.2307/1924371 and Litterman (1983) DOI:10.2307/1391858.
